titles.title: Electing officers of the House of Representatives.

action.text: DIVISION OF THE QUESTION - Mr. Pence demanded that the question be divided. Agreed to by unanimous consent.
On agreeing to the portion of the of the resolution electing the Chaplain. Agreed to by voice vote.
On agreeing to the remainder of the of the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

bill.summary: 1/6/2009--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Elects the following officers of the House of Representatives: (1) Lorraine C. Miller as Clerk; (2) Wilson S. Livingood as Sergeant at Arms; (3) Daniel P. Beard as Chief Administrative Officer; and (4) Father Daniel P. Coughlin as Chaplain.
